thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Happy in Burlington, ON
thread.title_full: Mabel's Labels reviewed by Happy in Burlington, ON

author: Happy in Burlington, ON
title: Happy in Burlington, ON
text: Fantastic! Highly recommend. Love the peel and stick and how the labels stay on the dishwasher and washer/dryer. I think I've only lost two labels mainly because I don't think I thought through where I put them on the mittens (I put them on the outside - silly me). And the other one not really sure what happened but my goodness, not a big deal at all. Just put a new one on! I handed down a hoodie and was able to peel off the label ams it came off nicely. Wow. Great product!
